title: Anti-Trump resistance groups are already gearing up
shortDescription: Trump resistance groups are giving activists room to grieve, but they are ready to harness public concern about his policies.

title: Where Musk agrees and disagrees with Trump on the economy
shortDescription: Elon Musk is already making his opinions on what is best for the economy known, even if they diverge from Donald Trump's.

title: Potential Trump pardons for Jan. 6 defendants spur hopes, fears
shortDescription: Trump has vowed repeatedly to pardon Jan. 6 defendants, which offers them hope and concerns judges presiding over the sometimes violent cases.

title: Trump nominated RFK Jr. to lead health agencies. What this could mean for the nation.
shortDescription: If RFK Jr.'s nomination is approved, he would be in charge of agencies tasked with things from medical research to public health.

title: House passes bill that expands federal power to target nonprofits
shortDescription: H.R. 9495 would authorize the treasury secretary to designate nonprofits as supporters of terrorism and strip them of their tax-exempt status.

title: Post falsely claims Trump left Mar-a-Lago in an ambulance | Fact check
shortDescription: A Secret Service spokesperson said no one protected by his agency was taken from the property for medical reasons or had any issues or concerns.

title: Trump hasn't signed transition of power agreements, White House says
shortDescription: Two weeks after his election victory, Donald Trump still has not signed documents needed to formally begin the transfer of power from Biden.

title: Democrat Bob Casey concedes to GOP's Dave McCormick in Pa. Senate race
shortDescription: The race has been among the closest in commonwealth history, with the two men separated by approximately a quarter of a percentage point.

title: Donald Trump to nominate Pam Bondi as U.S. attorney general
shortDescription: Donald Trump chose former Florida attorney general Pam Bondi to become top-law enforcement officer hours after Matt Gaetz withdrew his nomination.

title: TV stars picked for Trump's cabinet
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump picks for key cabinet positions have a thing or two in common with him: they've all done television.

title: GOP lawmaker introduces bill to end US Department of Education
shortDescription: Sen. Mike Rounds, R-South Dakota, on Thursday introduced a bill to eliminate the U.S. Department of Education.

title: Who will Trump pick for attorney general after Gaetz debacle?
shortDescription: Donald Trump heads back to the drawing board for attorney general after Matt Gaetz withdrew from consideration. Here are some candidates.

title: Who are Trump's Cabinet picks? Pam Bondi nominated for AG
shortDescription: Former Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz withdrew his nomination to be President-elect Donald Trump's attorney general amid allegations of sexual misconduct.

title: Post distorts judge's pausing of Trump hush money case | Fact check
shortDescription: While Judge Juan Merchan paused the case, there is no credible evidence Trump's conviction had been "dropped" when the post was shared.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene to chair Musk and Ramaswamy's DOGE subcommittee
shortDescription: President-elect Trump appointed Musk and Ramaswamy to "provide advice and guidance" to "dismantle government bureaucracy" and wasteful spending.

title: Trump tees up richest presidential administration in US history
shortDescription: Trump said he plans to nominate Doug Burgum, Howard Lutnick, Linda McMahon, Elon Musk, and Vivek Ramaswamy to his next administration.

title: Ethics committee split on Gaetz report
shortDescription: After a split vote, the House Ethics Committee is not set to release its report into allegations against former Rep. Matt Gaetz.
